wikipedia_page.main: Frank David Smith (27 July 1936 – June 2015) was an English professional footballer who played as a Right winger in the Football League for Chesterfield, Mansfield Town and Coventry City. He was on the books of Derby County without representing them in the League, and played non-league football for clubs including Boston United and Kidderminster Harriers.
